page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I usually get to school about 8.45. The classroom is open so I can go in and chat to my friends.If it's nice we go and sit under the trees on the field.If we don't have an Assembly we usually do Reading Workshop which is lots of different kinds of reading. After that we did maths and Problems and then finished some Project work on Europe. At lunchtime a few of us had a Recorder group.We are learning some music by Mozart.I had my packed lunch and played on the field with my friends. In the afternoon we had games and played Softball which is like Rounders but the bat and ball are bigger.I was caught out first go. After playtime we listened to a story from a tape called 'The Iron Man'. I like stories best of all.
